ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Rahul Kandimalla has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 6 years. Currently he is employed as a Sr. ETL Consultant at Bank Of America. Rahul has extensive knowledge of ETL, Informatica Analytics Package > Informatica PowerCenter, Oracle PL/SQL, SQL, Informatica, TOAD, Software Development Life Cycle, Microsoft SQL Server, XML, UNIX, Teradata, SDLC, Oracle 11g, Oracle 10G, Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server 2003, Web Services, Sun Solaris, Oracle 9i, Microsoft SQL*Loader, Data Migration, DB2. So far Rahul has not gained any managerial experience.
